part_description: The box has four flaps, two on each side, and a rectangular base. The flaps are equal in size and positioned at the top edges.
internal_interaction_description: The flaps can be folded inward or outward, allowing the box to open and close. The base supports the structure, while the flaps provide coverage and protection when closed.
external_interaction_description: The box can be used to store or transport items. It interacts with external elements by being carried, filled, or emptied by people, and can be stacked with other boxes.
